data.decision: MSJ Swimmer Dashboard: Blend of Playful Sports (A) and Minimal Clean (B) directions
data.rationale: Evaluation scores within 0.2% (A: 46.3, B: 46.2 weighted). Blended approach takes A's vibrant purple/teal palette and rounded corners for energy, combined with B's clean list structure and typography for readability. Final design achieves both athletic brand feel and functional clarity for swimmers tracking their progress.
alternatives: Direction A only (Playful Sports) - scored 46.3 weighted
Direction B only (Minimal Clean) - scored 46.2 weighted
data.context: MSJ (My Swim Journey) swimmer tracking app dashboard. Sports/fitness project type with evaluation weights: Visual Clarity 1.6x, User Flow 1.5x, Mobile Responsiveness 1.8x, Accessibility 1.2x.
